mapper.select: SELECT U.USERID, U.USERNAME, U.USERALIAS, U.HRCODE, R.ROLE_NAME, R.ROLE_CODE FROM BG_SYS_PRIV_USER_R_ROLE T INNER JOIN BG_SYS_ROLE R ON R.ID = T.ROLE_ID AND R.VALID = 1 INNER JOIN BG_SYS_USER U ON U.USERID = T.USER_ID AND U.STATE = 0 AND U.VALID = 1 WHERE 1 = 1 AND U.USERNAME = #{userName, jdbcType = VARCHAR} AND T.VALID = 1

SELECT U.USERID, U.USERNAME, U.USERALIAS, U.HRCODE, D.DEPTID, D.DEPTNAME, D.TYPE, D.DEPTCODE, D.PDEPTID, D.PDEPTNAME, D.PDEPTCODE FROM BG_SYS_PRIV_USER_R_ORGAN T INNER JOIN BG_SYS_USER U ON U.USERID = T.USER_ID AND U.STATE = 0 AND U.VALID = 1 INNER JOIN BG_SYS_DEPT D ON D.DEPTID = T.ORGAN_ID AND D.VALID = 1 WHERE 1 = 1 AND U.USERNAME = #{userName, jdbcType = VARCHAR} AND D.TYPE = #{roleType, jdbcType = VARCHAR} AND T.VALID = 1

select T.USERID, T.USERNAME, T.USERALIAS, T.HRCODE, T.SEX, T.EMAIL, T.MOBILE, T.CARDID, to_char(T.BIRTHDAY,'yyyy-MM-dd') BIRTHDAY, T.HRDEPTCODE, T.STATE, D.DEPTID from bg_SYS_USER T LEFT JOIN bg_SYS_DEPT D ON T.HRDEPTCODE = D.DEPTCODE where t.username = #{userName, jdbcType = VARCHAR}

select T.USERID, T.USERNAME, T.USERALIAS, T.HRCODE, T.SEX, T.EMAIL, T.MOBILE, T.CARDID, to_char(T.BIRTHDAY,'yyyy-MM-dd') BIRTHDAY, T.HRDEPTCODE, T.STATE, D.DEPTID from bg_SYS_USER T LEFT JOIN bg_SYS_DEPT D ON T.HRDEPTCODE = D.DEPTCODE where t.USERID = #{userId, jdbcType = VARCHAR}
